website_summaries.verdict: Great for pools that require frequent leaf and debris removal from the surface, this metal-rim leaf bag lasts through multiple seasons.
pros: Users like the durability and depth of this leaf bag skimmer
Extra mesh flap at bottom of bag reduces tangles, and double-layer mesh strengthens bag
Warranty replacement is legit, owners note
Grabs debris from the pool floor easily
cons: Netting can come apart after a few months
Gets heavy as net fills, especially at the end of a long extension pole
Dark-colored net makes it hard to see how much is in it
Finer mesh creates more drag, making it harder to use
Doesn’t pick up smaller particles well

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Warranty is a Sales Gimmick
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This is a fairly sturdy, good quality net. It will likely last longer than the average pool net. Cons: No net will last a lifetime. And the lifetime warranty is a gimmick. I've had it a couple years and it developed holes in the netting. I sent an e-mail to the company asking what was needed to obtain a replacement under warranty. They replied that they needed the invoice and pictures of the damage. I sent those. But now, I cannot get a response and its been 3 weeks. I guess they don't think people will actually use the warranty. I will change my review if I ever hear from FibroPool.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Young

customer_reviews.title: Stood behind warranty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in May 2016. Worked really well on bottom leaves, debris with the lip configuration. If you slide it along the bottom, step, etc. then stop just at the pile, the lip generates a good current that lifts the debris and it goes right into the net as you continue. The lip also hugs the bottom so most goes right in. Had an issue after over 2.5 years with some tears in the net. Contacted seller, received an immediate response asking for the order number, provided it, and received an immediate response that my new net is on the way. Very pleased with the product and the service. So few stand behind their products in this day.
customer_reviews.author: Jo J.

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Warranty applies to the frame only
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to read in the Amazon product description that this Fiberpool Leaf Skimmer Rake is covered by a Lifetime Warranty. At the price point it seemed to made sense. Upon receiving the item, the product package included a card that states the Lifetime Warranty only applies to the (aluminum core) frame. Normal wear and tear and the NET portion of the leaf rake are specifically Excluded from coverage. So, while it's not as good a value as I was initially led to believe, it is a sturdy looking net and hopefully will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: No questions asked warranty is a scam, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: So this is the net after a few years of use. The plastic is cracked and chipping away, metal frame is loose and flexing and of course the net finally just started melting away. Remember the "Industry leading no questions asked warranty"? Well if you noticed here they do ask questions and want pictures and most of the time just ignore the customer or flat out refuse to honor their warranty. If you are buying it for the warranty don't bother. A $7 net will do just as well and fail just as this one did, but be only $7.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seller made good on their promise
customer_reviews.text: Sadly after a few years my net started coming apart, most likely from the harsh California sun, I remembered the written promise the seller wrote when I purchased it "Backed by our industry leading, no-questions-asked satisfaction guarantee!" so I wrote them and asked if they would consider replacing it, this was on a Friday. Monday I had a brand new replacement! Thanks for the superb customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: true warranty great product...
customer_reviews.text: I originally rated this at 5 stars but I got it in October and now the netting is coming apart at the seams. I changed my rating to 1 star, I was contacted almost immediately by Matt. I told him the issue and he said he would have a new net to me in 2 days! This product truly has a lifetime warranty and this company stands behind it. This net is the best of the 4 I have owned and I would highly recommend it. Be confident in this purchase and if you have an issue, please contact them they will take care of you. Awesome company!!!
customer_reviews.author: At home in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Warranty?  Nope.
customer_reviews.text: I have really liked this product up until now. I have had it for a little over a year and the net now has several holes in it. I have attempted to contact the seller to enact the lifetime warranty - no response. The biggest reason I paid more this time was in hopes that it would actually last a lifetime, but that if it didn't, at least it would be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: BUY ONE TODAY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the absolute BEST purchase for our pool! We haven't purchased an automatic skimmer yet, mainly bc our pool is kept pretty clean with saltwater system...UNTIL winter. We live in Louisiana and our weather is nuts, hot one day and literally almost freezing temps the next. SO because of this lovely weather, the length of time the leaves are falling is several months. We have been able to literally clean out all of the leaves within 10 mins!!! I mean ALL the leaves that have been falling over these few months. Our pool hasn't been touched in months and the pump has NOT been running at all. This product is AMAZING! BUY ONE TODAY!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Bourgeois Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Quality product with a cool look!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time pool owner I wanted to make sure I was getting the right tools for the job. Right out of the gate you can tell this is a well built product. The double layer of netting allows me to skim the surface and grab stuff underwater with confidence. This is a big deal since i have trees over hanging our pool. Not only is this a quality device but hey it looks cool, and not boring like the old blue one we had before. I am now looking to see if they have a brush as well!!! TOP NOTCH!
customer_reviews.author: Alika L. Clissold

customer_reviews.title: Impressive so far
customer_reviews.text: The net system which is partly doubled and partly open works better than I expected. It holds the debris when I want it to and dumps it very easily. I won't know about durability for at least another year, unless the durability turns out to be quite bad.
customer_reviews.author: David Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: they don’t last perfect forever, run a net against a pool wall ...
customer_reviews.text: I own a pool business, just food for thought to all the people complaining about a little tear - zip Tie it shut- In the business we zip tie vacuum bags and nets all the time, they don’t last perfect forever, run a net against a pool wall or snag a bush it might just tear a little -I bought this one to ad to my collection of probably 15 nets - they are all full of zip ties. This net is not the best commercial net but if I used it for home only it would be a great one, I’d recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: The BEST I have ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST Leaf Net I have ever owned. One of the key differences is the mesh leaf bag, it is a soft fabric mesh with an extra piece of heavy duty fabric mesh for added durability. Also the capacity is probably 50% more than any other leaf bag I have had. Previously had Gorilla, HTH etc. Also Aluminum Frame extends up into the Pole Insert - the last two that I have had were plastic and this was the part that broke.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Aycock

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. The thin "blade" of the opening helps it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. The thin "blade" of the opening helps it pick up the smallest pebbles and leaves. The double netting does slow you down a bit and requires more force to move it along but I'm not complaining because that's just more junk its catching. Still much more efficient than my last net because of how well it scoops things up. Very durable and well made. This is how pool equipment SHOULD be.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I work for a custom pool installer and have seen ...
customer_reviews.text: I work for a custom pool installer and have seen some of the equipment they use for opening polls for the summer season. This is very much on par with what the company uses to clean their customer's pools. I'm very impressed with the quality and see it lasting many years.
customer_reviews.author: Impact9

customer_reviews.title: High quality, durable product
customer_reviews.text: I decided to spend a little more to get this because I have gone through 2 cheaper nets in the past 3 years. This one is a little smaller than I expected, but seems to be higher quality and durable. I haven't had it long enough to speak to the longevity, but it appears that it will be worth the additional money relative to less expensive nets in the long-run
customer_reviews.author: Jdp6575

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: It is a durable looking net. I wish it wasn’t quite so deep as it makes dumping it a chore. I usually have to try to flip it several times before I get it right. I does look like it will last me a few years though.
customer_reviews.author: bobmac

customer_reviews.title: good skimmer questionable warranty
customer_reviews.text: This skimmer goes through the water much more easily than my old skimmer net. My old net was like moving a 5 lb. weight through the water. this one feels more like my skimmer net that is flat. The one complaint I have is the lifetime warranty, Unlike some of the other net's warranties this warranty only cover defects in the product. Hopefully I will not have to find out what that means.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Professional feel and it works great...
customer_reviews.text: Fiberglass is much better than plastic. This product does a wonderful job and seems a little heavier on the end of a long handle, but quite manageable. Our pool is not covered in the winter so I tried this out when I received it, with great results. I usually flip the basket over and bounce the pole against the top of the pool fence to get the leaves out. This product feels sturdy when I do that. The lifetime warranty is nice, but I will store it in the pump house. Common sense to do so, but I'm sure it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great net!
customer_reviews.text: Works as promises and has a large surface area covered in every sweep. Appears to be durable to date as we haev had no issues with regular use. It is high perforgn with less drag than expected in skimming.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Same one my pool man uses
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pull through the water. Not as much drag as you would get from the nets made from cloth with finer weave. The mesh has two layers of differing size holes. One is a fine netting. The other is slightly larger. Works great to remove any small particles from the trees/insects that are in the pool..may not work as well for fine pollen as the cloth nets. Over the past 15yrs, I've been through my fair share of nets, this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as promised, it is commercial grade and very sturdy. Works great! Has cut my skimming time in half. Revisiting this review. It has been only one year since purchase (did not even use much at first...because I was working out of town and paid for pool service) and there is already a separation in the bottom of net. Supposed to have a lifetime warranty...no replies from the seller. Calling Amazon directly next.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and beginning to question warranty with no response
customer_reviews.text: Used this net for several years without issue. Now we are seeing holes in the net to the point it is no longer usable. Reached out for warranty as this has lifetime warranty. Initial reply was fast but we forwarded photos and now no response after sending multiple emails over the last week.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Parsons

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Very strong & good quality pool net. Looks like it will last forever compared to the usual white swimming pool nets we have always bought and had to replace EVERY YEAR because the would always get tears & holes in them. The quality of this one so far is far superior. I highly recommend getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fails after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Was excited about it at first but that lasted about 6 months and then the net fell apart. Contacted seller, and he sent me a warranty card and asked me to contact the manufacturer for warranty service. Not worth it for me to mess around with that for the $$ paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made very sturdy and seems to be as it is described
customer_reviews.text: i have only used this rake a few times since getting it. Made very sturdy and seems to be as it is described. The only problem I am having is getting use to the lip design on it. It is going to take some practice before I can say I am a pro at it. But I am looking forward to having a leaf rake that will last a complete year before I have to replace it. And since it has a life time warranty makes it even more desirable.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: FibroPool stands behind their warranty
customer_reviews.text: Great quality net. Yet after 3 years my plastic handle happened to break. I contacted FibroPool and had the new plastic handle delivered in a couple days. The quality exceeds any net I could by locally including big box and the they stood behind the warranty. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: james b white

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Glides through the water easier than my last one, can't explain why though but it does. Definitely looks and feels strong. Hopefully won't have to buy another one for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Good quality skimmer net
customer_reviews.text: My initial impression is this is a well designed and quality made pool net. Time will tell as my old net (different manufacturer) started to deteriorate after a couple summers. That's why I didn't mind paying a little more this time because of the lifetime warranty. Hope it pays off.
customer_reviews.author: fyrefiter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scoop
customer_reviews.text: This net does a great job of scooping up the leaves, especially off the bottom of the pool. It's very sturdy and the rim doesn't bend like so many cheaper ones do. After years of replacing nets after a couple of seasons, I'm expecting much longer life from this one. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Key of B

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but doesn’t last. Forever guarantee???
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my company every few months. I like the product but they do not last. I’d like to know about the forever guarantee? What does it include?? I do think they should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen B

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made
customer_reviews.text: Our old leaf net bit the dust, made of cheaper plastic. This one is really great. While I haven't had it for years yet, I can tell that it will hold up very very well. This is a good thing because the last thing I want to deal with while trying to clean the pool is the net breaking just as we're preparing to relax in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Best pool skimmer net
customer_reviews.text: Best pool net I've bought --- looks like it will last a lot longer than any of the others I've had. Sturdy, strong netting material; great design. Backed up by a lifetime warranty!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This product performs just as Fibro Pool describes. From the first time I used this product I knew it would do well for what I needed it to do. I would recommend this product to anyone with a pool that have tree leaf problems. Gets small debris from the bottom of my pool as well as leaves. I like being able to collect a lot of leaves before having to empty the net.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie J Carson

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just tried out my new pool net and really like it so far. It seems much more durable than the plastic ones I've purchased in the past. The net seems to flow through the water without a lot of resistance and makes scooping the leaves an easy task. I especially like the lifetime warranty which I hope I never have to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stefkski

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great choice it is really easy to empty and fill, I highly recommend it. The old one I had that came from my local pool store had a much stiffer blue net and it was really hard to empty and required me to use my hand to scrap out the debris.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted all summer and ready for next year. Went through two of the white rimmed/blue nets before I found this. Great product! Fair Price.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to keep it out of direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well until it got tattered under the sun a year later. Previous nets I've had lasted at least 3 years in the same condition.
customer_reviews.author: PowerMood

customer_reviews.title: Quality nice deep pool net
customer_reviews.text: quality pool net, nice and deep so can capture tons of leaves without them slipping out. The edge or lip is the only thing which doesn't quite scrape small debris into net that well, but does get the majority so I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rauwald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cleaning. It's a little on the heavier side but does a great job. Love it and highly recommended. Comes with lifetime warranty. Cleanse great.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great net
customer_reviews.text: When you have the right equipment you can do a good job. This net replaced an old one that broke. It glides on bottom of pool nicely and captures every leaf and bug. Once inside this net, it stays there until I'm ready to flip it and empty. No more losing what I captured as I try to get more. Great net, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: 4 months later it’s falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was made well but 4 months later it’s falling apart very upset and I keep it in the shed not out in the sun .
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Danna

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control and Useless warranty. BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: The stitching opened up. It’s been used only for one season. Crappy quality control. Have contacted vendor for replacement but they are bouncing me to amazon as it was fulfilled by amazon.
customer_reviews.author: zr

customer_reviews.title: After 18 months of use the net required replacement. ...
customer_reviews.text: After 18 months of use the net required replacement. Applied for warranty replacement. The leaf skimmer was readily replaced. Service after the sale!
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Way stronger commercial-grade net.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Way stronger than the commercial-grade net I had before. The red rim also does a great job protecting the net from scraping the sides of the pool. Well-designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Pinted edge captures cell phones in the pool with ease.
customer_reviews.text: We love this. It captures cell phones in the pool with no problems. The edge of this frame is pointed and without it, it never would have been able to pick up the cell phone from the bottom of a very cold pool.
customer_reviews.author: BSG

customer_reviews.title: ... yet but it is well built and I really like that it is backed up with a great warranty
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but it is well built and I really like that it is backed up with a great warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Tom K.

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: After a month of heavy use, all is well. Big fan of the finer mesh, really helps to get the smaller stuff. Plus, with finer mesh if you do get a tear it's not nearly as bad as with wider mesh.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Is a good product. Lifetime warranty replacements not worth it because the cost of replacement is just a little shy of the cost of the item. Product is average
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Works best on the bottom when it is pushed into the ...
customer_reviews.text: This gets floating stuff as well as stuff on the bottom. Works best on the bottom when it is pushed into the debris.
customer_reviews.author: J R.

customer_reviews.title: Ya get what ya pay for!
customer_reviews.text: This sucker really works well. I messed up and bought a less expensive one and got exactly what I paid for. Nice wide mouth, Looks like a good sturdy mesh, holds ton of leaves, nothing bends or even acts like it may break. Stupid frame! I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Blair

customer_reviews.title: Nice large scoop
customer_reviews.text: Nice pool scoop... works well with a nice wide mouth. I see people complaining about a net that's loose mine has that too but I think it's designed that way... not sure why but it works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... pool for 25 years now and this is the best leaf skimmer I have owned
customer_reviews.text: I've had my pool for 25 years now and this is the best leaf skimmer I have owned. Arrived promptly and am extremely pleased-
customer_reviews.author: Frederick J

customer_reviews.title: Its a pool leaf rake
customer_reviews.text: It looks to be a really nice leaf rake. I believe i will like this one
customer_reviews.author: EyeVape

customer_reviews.title: Good quality...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Deep pocket holds the debris and is easy to empty. Push button clip makes it easy to install/remove from pole.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I actually think this net is great, seems really well constructed. The only thing I can't figure out is why the screws have rusted slightly. Why wouldn't they use stainless as opposed to chrome?
customer_reviews.author: Assterix

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Fit perfectly on the pole I had. Larger than my previous skimmer and therefore more effective for cleaning my pool. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one season
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this net. Unfortunately it lasted one season. For some reason the net has developed several holes in the netting along the backside of the frame.
customer_reviews.author: shannon a

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several brands over the years, really like this this one has a sturdy frame but that the net is not as stiff as others have been and has the that extra piece of netting that stirs up the leaves making them easier to grab with the net
customer_reviews.author: gcervantes9

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: The angle on the lip is not great for really cleaning the bottom of the pool. Looks pretty stout and should last a good long while.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would like to replace this net, the first one was not sewed correctly
customer_reviews.author: gustavo

customer_reviews.title: The flat edge on the hoop is a nice design feature that allows you to scrape the leaves ...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a plastic skimmer that broke after about a year of use. This product has a more solid construction and is simple to use. The flat edge on the hoop is a nice design feature that allows you to scrape the leaves stuck against the side of the pool pretty effectively. Overall a nice deal.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent net! It worked wonders for cleaning and opening my pool. It is built very sturdy. I chose this one over a similar, more expensive product and so far I am very pleased with my decision on this net.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!! They say LIFETIME WARRANTY Well they are wrong. So my net broke and I reach out and they will not give me a new net. I will get my money back but that is not why I bought the swimming pool net.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This net is a beast!!
customer_reviews.text: This net is a beast!! I recommend buying it and forgetting about everything else. I lifted up like 10 pounds of sand with this thing and it didn’t even phase it
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Rice

customer_reviews.title: Not Professional Grade
customer_reviews.text: Not a professional grade like Purity. Net league leave particles to scape. Maybe Go good for residential use.
customer_reviews.author: PoolsEmergency

customer_reviews.title: Order one you will enjoy using it! Makes your job a lot easier!
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought one years ago! The metal ring for stability is awesome and the bag does an awesome job with all those leaves I the bottom of the pool! I give it a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Schultz

customer_reviews.title: easy efficient tool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool for cleaning out those nasty leaves, especially the ones on the bottom of the pool. cut clean up time to a fraction of what I formerly did.
customer_reviews.author: abswini

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the surface cleaning it is excellent, limited usability for the bottom cleaning because it is too soft
customer_reviews.author: Yeling Z.

customer_reviews.title: This product was a great choice. In fact
customer_reviews.text: Finally bought a new leaf skimmer after many years. This product was a great choice. In fact, it is better than the last as it has extra netting which helps skim much more from my pool keeping it clean looking.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: strong and study. only had it for a couple of weeks, but I had lots of leaves waiting for it. I bought it for the warranty. Might not need it.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: It looks pretty sturdy and seems to work well so far. Will see how long it lasts and doesn't get holes or frame cracks! That is the key question.
customer_reviews.author: Petunia

customer_reviews.title: Best one we ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best one we ever bought! The net is thicker and the rim sturdier. I am confident it will last a long,long time!
customer_reviews.author: Roseamry Childress

customer_reviews.title: Not A Fine Mesh Net
customer_reviews.text: The netting is not nearly as fine as I'd hoped. Small pieces of plant matter, bugs, hair etc., may not stay in net. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: PinkFlamingo

customer_reviews.title: Hope it wears as good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: Hope it wears as good as it looks, been thru dozens over the last 20 years. This appears to be the most well made! Thank You Karol
customer_reviews.author: Karol

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a strong frame with a large net
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a strong frame with a large net. I think it will be perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: wesley

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great picks up small leaves and bugs off of the bottom of the pool. Solid Construction.
customer_reviews.author: Marc LeMessurier

customer_reviews.title: Still testing
customer_reviews.text: Already show sign of wear an tear in less than one season with low usage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cheaper than the pool store and it felt durable while using. money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Fibropro 18in Professional Grade Metal leaf skimmer is GREAT !
customer_reviews.text: Best pool skimmer I have ever had. Very well built and the large net really hold a lot of leaves, etc. Makes pool cleaning quick work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hand

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Good net after 2 months of use. I bought it b/c the other reviewers said it was high quality. So time will tell. I will report if this fails within the first couple of seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L Carter

customer_reviews.title: Don't get the plastic ones.. they break after ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't get the plastic ones.. they break after a short amount of time.. this one is with a metal frame and worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bode

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Was tired of buying less expensive models that would tear after a few uses. This model does seem pro-grade.
customer_reviews.author: U2

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT waste your $$. Construction is no better that Wal-Mart offers for 1/3 price. Mesh came out of frame in a non-wear area. After 1 week of emails/phone calls still no response from FibroPRO. if you have an issue like mine ( even after sending emails with photo) FibroPRO want customer to return ( at customer's expense) so they can make decision.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy this Net
customer_reviews.text: After about one year of use holes began forming in the net. The product is supposed to have a warranty, but the company does not respond to messages. I would recommend buying a net from another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: James Toal

customer_reviews.title: Good looking leaf net
customer_reviews.text: It just came yesterday and it looks like a quality net. We shall see how long it can take sun and chlorine. It would be great to last my line time :-)
customer_reviews.author: Gofast

customer_reviews.title: There is more drag bc the mesh is so fine. Btw
customer_reviews.text: It's top quality. Likely the last one I will need to buy. There is more drag bc the mesh is so fine. Btw. the extra mesh flap on the bottom is designed NOT to be sewn all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: product failure
customer_reviews.text: came with lifetime warranty and it lasted less than 2 months before a hole developed in the bottom of the skimmer. I have contacted the seller and told him of my experience and waiting on his reply. Just wanted to let Amazon know of my actions. Respectfully, Scott Harrington
customer_reviews.author: S Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Net
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through plenty of pool nets over the years, this one is by far the worst. The holes in the net allow smaller debris to go through the net and back into pool. Pine needles also go through net. Lesson learned, this net is useless.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth the extra money, it hasn't shown any sign of wear in two seasons of use. And with a warranty to boot, this may be the last one I'll ever need to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: spongebob_sps

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life!!! Such a huge time ...
customer_reviews.text: Changed my life!!! Such a huge time saver compared to a traditional skimmer. Gets tiny grass blades and larger leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah C.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and appears to be high quality material. Hopefully it will last longer than what is available locally. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: stanjk

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent net! Very well made and durable. Super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was so bad and fell apart got holes in it that we had to send it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Appears well made -- definitely hope it lasts a long ...
customer_reviews.text: Appears well made -- definitely hope it lasts a long time. Bought because of the lifetime warranty. Other standard skimmer nets last only 2-3 years.
customer_reviews.author: CKB

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Works best of all when leaves and large debris in pool. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: spongella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service and a fantastic pool net made durable and double netting provides for good cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: TED

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Got an amazing workout cleaning the pool with this, had no idea it was going to be such high quality. The price is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice leaf skimmer, I have to buy a new one every summer, not anymore, good warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Warranty???
customer_reviews.text: After one year of use, the net has a big hole in it. There’s no information on how to exercise the lifetime warranty
customer_reviews.author: Martin D.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong netting.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and strong netting. Works well and looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: stopper

product_meta.title: FibroPool Professional 18" Swimming Pool Leaf Skimmer Net
feature_bullets: Professional grade leaf net with an extra large 18″ mesh area maximizes cleaning efficiency. Cut your maintenance time in half and reduce fatigue!
Heavy-duty alloy aluminum frame will last year after year while a protective abs coating with smooth, lightweight edges ensure you won’t damage vinyl liners or other sensitive pool surfaces.
A secondary mesh layer sewn onto the sides provides extra protection. **Note this layer is left unstitched to the front of the frame to reduce excess drag**

Durable, dual-layer Fibromesh will pick up even the smallest floating debris before it becomes a problem on your pool floor! Our special polymer blend is heat-molded for longevity and formulated to perform in any environment.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars384 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
